raw_results.scenario_label: Registry Coverage: specific signal detection using Infection Risks definitions.

errors: summary:Summary missing phrases: antibiotic prophylaxis was not administered within the recommended time frame, developed fever and purulent drainage from the incision site...

engine_output.raw_input: [MD 2025-01-02T08:30Z]: Patient, a 15-year-old female with idiopathic scoliosis, underwent spinal fusion surgery. Post-operative day 5, she developed fever and purulent drainage from the incision site. Upon review, it was noted that antibiotic prophylaxis was not administered within the recommended time frame.

signal_objects.description: Antibiotic prophylaxis was not administered within the recommended time frame, potentially leading to infection.
signal_objects.provenance: it was noted that antibiotic prophylaxis was not administered within the recommended time frame.

signal_objects.description: Development of fever and purulent drainage from the incision site indicates a risk of post-operative infection.
signal_objects.provenance: Post-operative day 5, she developed fever and purulent drainage from the incision site.

raw_results.scenario_label: Registry Coverage: specific signal detection using Bundle Compliance definitions.

errors: summary:Summary missing phrases: the surgical pause was not documented, presented with hardware migration and required a return to the OR...

engine_output.raw_input: [MD 2025-01-03T09:15Z]: A 14-year-old male patient was admitted for idiopathic scoliosis correction. Post-operatively, he presented with hardware migration and required a return to the OR. A review of the surgical notes revealed that the surgical pause was not documented, raising concerns about procedural compliance and safety.

signal_objects.description: Lack of documentation for surgical pause raises concerns about procedural compliance and safety.
signal_objects.provenance: A review of the surgical notes revealed that the surgical pause was not documented.

raw_results.scenario_label: Registry Coverage: specific signal detection using Outcome Risks definitions.

errors: summary:Summary missing phrases: experienced increased back pain two weeks post-surgery, loss of reduction of the spinal curve and hardware failure...

engine_output.raw_input: [MD 2025-01-04T11:00Z]: The patient, a 16-year-old female, experienced increased back pain two weeks post-surgery. She was readmitted with imaging revealing loss of reduction of the spinal curve and hardware failure. This complication highlights the need for better post-operative monitoring and follow-up.

signal_objects.description: Patient readmitted due to loss of reduction and hardware failure post-surgery.
signal_objects.provenance: The patient, a 16-year-old female, experienced increased back pain two weeks post-surgery. She was readmitted with imaging revealing loss of reduction of the spinal curve and hardware failure.

signal_objects.description: Need for better post-operative monitoring and follow-up highlighted by complications.
signal_objects.provenance: This complication highlights the need for better post-operative monitoring and follow-up.

raw_results.scenario_label: Registry Coverage: specific signal detection using Readmission Risks definitions.

errors: summary:Summary missing phrases: returned with abdominal pain and constipation, not received adequate bowel regimen instructions leading to GI complications...

engine_output.raw_input: [MD 2025-01-05T14:20Z]: The patient, a 13-year-old boy with idiopathic scoliosis, was discharged post-op but returned with abdominal pain and constipation. An evaluation revealed he had not received adequate bowel regimen instructions leading to GI complications. This indicates a gap in discharge planning.

signal_objects.description: Inadequate bowel regimen instructions leading to GI complications post-discharge.
signal_objects.provenance: The patient... returned with abdominal pain and constipation. An evaluation revealed he had not received adequate bowel regimen instructions leading to GI complications.

raw_results.scenario_label: Registry Coverage: specific signal detection using core definitions.

errors: summary:Summary missing phrases: returned within a week complaining of uncontrolled pain, no clear pain management plan was documented prior to discharge...

engine_output.raw_input: [MD 2025-01-06T16:45Z]: A 15-year-old female patient was discharged after spinal surgery but returned within a week complaining of uncontrolled pain. Assessment showed no clear pain management plan was documented prior to discharge, contributing to her readmission.

signal_objects.description: Patient readmitted due to uncontrolled pain after spinal surgery.
signal_objects.provenance: A 15-year-old female patient was discharged after spinal surgery but returned within a week complaining of uncontrolled pain.

signal_objects.description: Lack of a clear pain management plan documented prior to discharge.
signal_objects.provenance: Assessment showed no clear pain management plan was documented prior to discharge, contributing to her readmission.

signal_objects.description: Patient returned to the hospital post-discharge due to complications.

signal_objects.provenance: The patient was started on IV antibiotics immediately.

errors: summary:Summary missing phrases: the timing of antibiotic prophylaxis was not documented, Patient is back in the ED with severe back pain and fever...
